    sparse_graph¶

    sparse_matrix¶

    <<<<<<< HEAD
    vizcovidfr.sparse.sparse.sparse_matrix(show=True)¶

    Return and plot the adjacency matrix of the graph of the transfer of patient with Covid-19, inside or outside France. This, by definition, is a sparse matrix.

    Parameters

    show (bool, optional, default=True) – whether or not to show the matrix

    Returns

    the adjacency matrix of transfer graph and a plot of its representation

    Return type

    scipy.sparse.csr.csr_matrix

    Examples

    >>> sparse_matrix(show=True)
    ======= >>>>>>> regression 
    >>> from scipy.sparse import isspmatrix
>>> A = sparse_matrix(show=False)
>>> print(isspmatrix(A))
True
